page.title: 12CHANGING TIMES IN RIPON
page.content: 1905 My grandfather had coaches and he took people from the Unicorn hotel to the station.There were other coaching inns, one of which,The York Inn,stood where Boots chemists is now.In this time (women)wore tight corsets and small bustles and ankle length dresses,men wore tight trousers and spats. 1925 Sir Alan Cobham's"Air Circus" visited Ripon on the site where the race course is now and for half a crown you could have a flight above Ripon.School children of Ripon had swimming lessons at the bathing pavilion(by the river Ure)where Mr.Duffield taught you to swim with the aid of a pole and a leather hoop.At the bathing pavilion people swam,punted and sometimes even camped.
